content: This product addresses the need for marketers, to better understand the user-generated content, or tweets displayed adjacent to their ads in Twitter feed further demonstrating IAS's strength, in classifying multimedia content prevalent on social platforms. So the intent of our TikTok solution is absolutely to scale it across multiple markets for the global marketers interested in investing more in TikTok and want to rest assured that when they run their branded campaigns on TikTok, especially in a live feed, it's running in brand safe and brand suitable environments.
